local id = render.getTextureID("phoenix_storms/wire/pcb_red")

local gr_up = render.getTextureID("gui/gradient_up")
local gr_down = render.getTextureID("gui/gradient_down")
local yPos = 0

local function Animate()
	yPos = yPos + time.frameTime() * 100
	if (yPos > 552) then
		yPos = -40
	end
end

local lockedScreen = {}
lockedScreen.Name = "Locked"
function lockedScreen:OnRender()
	Animate()
	render.setColor(255, 0, 0)
	gl.glBindTexture(id)
	gl.glRect(0, 0, 1024, 512)

	gl.glBindTexture(gr_up)
	gl.glRect(0, yPos, 1024, 20)
	gl.glBindTexture(gr_down)
	gl.glRect(0, yPos + 20, 1024, 20)

	gl.glBindFont(Screen.TitleFont)
	gl.glBindColor(255, 255, 255)
	local w = gl.glTextWidth("Lockdown")
	gl.glText("Lockdown", 256 - w / 2, 256 - 64)

	gl.glBindColor(255, 255, 255)
	gl.glBindFont(Screen.StandardFont)
	local w1 = gl.glTextWidth("SGControler by Yuri6037")
	gl.glText("SGControler by Yuri6037", 256 - w1 / 2, 20)
	local w2 = gl.glTextWidth("AI is in Lockdown !")
	gl.glText("AI is in Lockdown !", 256 - w2 / 2, 512 - 54)

	gl.glBindFont(font)
	local str = tbl[math.random(#tbl)]
	local w3 = gl.glTextWidth(str)
	gl.glText(str, 256 - w3 / 2, 300)
	gl.glText(str, 256 - w3 / 2, 195)
end
function lockedScreen:OnShow()
end
function lockedScreen:OnExit()
end
function lockedScreen:OnTouched()
end

Screen:Register(lockedScreen)
